# ampir <a href='https://github.com/Legana/ampir'><img src="figures/ampir_hex.png" width="90" align="right" height="100" /></a>

# AMP prediction

This repository contains code used for the [ampir](https://github.com/Legana/ampir) R package paper 

- [Collate data](01_collate_databases.md) : Rmd file [01_collate_databases.Rmd](01_collate_databases.Rmd)
- [Build training sets](02_build_training_data.md) : Rmd file [0202_build_training_data.Rmd](02_build_training_data.Rmd)
- [Feature selection analysis](03_feature_selection.md) : Rmd file [03_feature_selection.Rmd](03_feature_selection.Rmd)
- [Model tuning](04_tune_model.md) : Rmd file [04_tune_model.Rmd](04_tune_model.Rmd)
- [Benchmarking](05_benchmark.md) : Rmd file [05_benchmark.Rmd](05_benchmark.Rmd)

The files required to run the code in these Rmd files can be obtained [here](https://cloudstor.aarnet.edu.au/plus/s/kYedwzkgUBjCmos) or by using the command:

```bash
wget 'https://cloudstor.aarnet.edu.au/plus/s/kYedwzkgUBjCmos' -O data.tgz
tar -zxvf data.tgz 
```
